title: Road to valorisation of melon seeds (Cucumis melo L.): a comprehensive review of nutritional profiles, biological activities, and food applications
content:
Sustainable Food Technol., 2024, Advance Article
DOI: 10.1039/D4FB00119B, Review Article
Open Access
Â  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution 3.0 Unported Licence.
Guoqiang Zhang, Ziqian Li, Litai Liu, Qisen Xiang
This review intends to promote a better understanding of melon seed properties that could enable the efficient utilisation of melon seeds and promote viable valorisation routes.
To cite this article before page numbers are assigned, use the DOI form of citation above.
